api.name: GetInsulinCategories
api.description: returns the list of available insulin categories

api.name: GetInsulinCategoriesByCountry
api.description: returns the list of available insulin categories

parameters.name: countrycode
parameters.description: The two letter country code used to translate the category names - eg US, DE

api.name: GetInsulinCountries
api.description: returns the list of available insulin countries

api.name: GetInsulinList
api.description: returns the list of available insulin

api.name: GetInsulinByCountry
api.description: returns the list of available insulin for the given country.

parameters.name: countrycode
parameters.description: The two letter country code - eg US, DE

api.name: GetInsulin
api.description: returns insulin information for the given insulin GUID

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The GUID of the insulin to be returned.
